name: Disaster Office
description:
Not every day is the same in this office! Play as Jim, a regular office guy with nothing in his mind but to do his work! Stamp, file, stamp, file... but, watch out! Dodge, jump, duck, throw and hide are part of the job too!

Sounds easy? Well, give it a try!
The game presents five different levels, one for each day of office work, with different actions like jumping over some hot lava, throwing some bombs or hiding from the zombies!
Try to make a hi-score before the day ends, or before you get KO!

(If you want to compete with your friends and unlock achievements, feel free to try the Android version on Google Play!)

-*Version 1.5*-

  • Visual cues
  • Tutorial in-game
  • Zombie day: now you kick'em!
